ygData.subject: RE: since harpers.net is no more
ygData.msgSnippet: ... *boggles at the thought that you could get to level 35 and not know this*  :-) They really need to fix our spellbooks so it lists the instrument type as
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 29 Oct 1999, James Schuldes wrote:
>
> Hmm, I just went and looked at the song listing there and thought hmm, it
> might be interesting to see all of our songs sorted by the instrument that
> enhances them - so I cut and pasted into excel and got a sorted list.
> Looking it over I notice that both charm and mez are listed as enhanced by
> wind instruments! Wow - is that right?

*boggles at the thought that you could get to level 35 and not
know this* :-)

They really need to fix our spellbooks so it lists the
instrument type as part of the song description.

> I mean do they show significant
> benefit when played with a wind instrument? That could explain why they

As far as I can tell, they gain no benefit from using a wind
instrument. My charisma may be so high as to swamp out the
effect though.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
